OrgName: Verint Systems Inc. and all of its U.S. subsidiaries
activities: Verint may use personal information received from the EU/EEA and/or Switzerland as part of Verint’s professional services, support and product offerings, including hosted solutions. Verint may also use such personal information in order to provide customers with additional information about Verint products and service offerings at their request. Verint may use such personal information to comply with legal and compliance obligations as permitted by law.
corpofftitle1: Chief Legal Officer, Chief Compliance Officer and Corporate Officer

personaldata: Online and Offline Customer Data. Includes manually processed customer data.
